articles.description: Virginia is the top overall seed in preliminary NCAA Tournament rankings, with Villanova, Xavier and Purdue earning the other top seeds.
articles.headline: Virginia, Villanova, Xavier, Purdue top preliminary NCAA rankings

images.caption: The No. 2 Cavaliers force overtime with a pair of late buckets from Ty Jerome, but in the extra session, the Hokies' Kerry Blackshear Jr. scores an and-1 with under 10 seconds remaining for a 61-60 victory.
images.name: Virginia Tech takes down No. 2 Virginia in OT

articles.description: Marvin Bagley III, who suffered a mild right knee sprain Thursday, will miss Duke's game against Georgia Tech on Sunday as a precaution.
articles.headline: Marvin Bagley III to miss Sunday's game with mild knee sprain

articles.description: Joe Lunardi weighs in on what the Wildcats' unprecedented three-game losing streak means for their standing in the SEC and the NCAA tournament.
articles.headline: Time for Kentucky to panic?

images.caption: Joe Lunardi weighs in on what the Wildcats' unprecedented three-game losing streak means for their standing in the SEC and the NCAA tournament.
images.name: Time for Kentucky to panic?

articles.description: Selection Sunday is exactly one month away. Here's what you'll see in four weeks: Michael Porter Jr. will be back and a nightmare for a No. 1 seed, Trae Young's Sooners will drop, and the ACC will dominate the field
articles.headline: Selection Sunday is a month away ... here's what will happen

images.caption: Michael Porter Jr.'s season was supposed to be over ... unless it isn't.
images.name: Michael Porter [608x342]

images.caption: Trae Young has carried Oklahoma, but the final stretch could be more than he can handle on his own.
images.name: Trae Young [608x342] - Copy (2)

images.caption: The crowd goes wild in Virginia as College GameDay explains what it means to be a "great team" in the chaos of college basketball this season.
images.name: Any great college hoops team right now?

articles.description: Tavrion Dawson and Micheal Warren tossed in 22 points apiece and Cal State-Northridge shot 65 percent from the floor in a 77-71 victory over Hawaii on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Dawson propels CSU Northridge to 77-71 win over Hawaii

articles.description: Gabe Levin and Temidayo Yussuf posted double-doubles and Long Beach State pulled away in the second half to defeat Cal Poly 73-54 on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Levin, Yussuf power Long Beach State past Cal Poly 73-54
